mean_en: the act of using force to control a group of people and restrict their freedom; the act of controlling strong emotions and desires and not allowing them to be expressed so that they no longer seem to exist
sentence: Slaves had a very low social status and were under constant repression.
sentence_trans: 奴隶的社会地位很低并且长期受到压迫。
word_etyma: re再 + press挤压 + ion名词后缀 → repression压抑
